data.title: Books by Kurt Aland
data.meta_description: Get all the published books by authors
data.text:
How does it work?

Once you confirm your details, our booksellers will check the availability of the book to get it to you as soon as possible. Within a maximum of 72 hours, we will contact you by email to inform you of when we might have your book and confirm your purchase from there.

Name

Email

Where are you at?

I need it, I'll wait as long as it takes!

I'd like to know how long it will take to decide.

Write the name of the person to whom you want to dedicate the book. The author will sign the book and we will send it to your home (or you can pick it up at the bookstore) starting: .

Name
